quote: 認識你自己。(Know thyself.)
author: 蘇格拉底 (Socrates) (傳說刻在德爾斐神廟)

quote: 未經審視的人生不值得過。(The unexamined life is not worth living.)
author: 蘇格拉底 (Socrates)

quote: 我們無法選擇生命的長短，但我們可以控制它的寬度與深度。(We cannot choose the length of our lives, but we can control their width and depth.)
author: 愛爾蘭諺語 (Irish Proverb) / 史蒂芬·柯維 (Stephen Covey) (類似觀點)

quote: 幸福不在於找到完美的人，而在於學會用完美的眼光欣賞一個不完美的人。(Happiness is not about finding the right person, but about learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.)
author: 一行禪師 (Thich Nhat Hanh) (類似觀點)

quote: 人生百分之十在於你所遭遇的事，百分之九十在於你如何回應它。(Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.)
author: 查爾斯·斯溫多爾 (Charles R. Swindoll)

quote: 不要等待完美時刻，把握當下，讓它變得完美。(Don't wait for the perfect moment, take the moment and make it perfect.)
author: 佐伊·金塞拉 (Zoey Sayward)

quote: 改變你能改變的，接受你不能改變的，並擁有區分這兩者的智慧。(Change what you can, accept what you cannot, and have the wisdom to know the difference.)
author: 寧靜禱文 (Serenity Prayer) (萊因霍爾德·尼布爾)

quote: 我們看到的並非事物的本質，而是我們自己。(We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are.)
author: 阿娜伊斯·寧 (Anaïs Nin) / 塔木德 (Talmud) (類似觀點)

quote: 如果你想了解一個人，不要聽他說什麼，而要看他做什麼。(If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.)
author: J.K. 羅琳 (J.K. Rowling)
work: 《哈利波特》(天狼星·布萊克的話)

quote: 人生最大的冒險，就是過你夢想的生活。(The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.)
author: 歐普拉·溫芙蕾 (Oprah Winfrey)

quote: 心靈的平靜始於不期望他人按你的方式行事。(Peace of mind comes from not wanting to change others.)
author: 傑拉爾德·賈姆波爾斯基 (Gerald G. Jampolsky)

quote: 你給予世界的，世界將回報給你。(What you give to the world, the world will give back to you.)
author: 不詳 (因果循環的普遍法則)

quote: 不要為打翻的牛奶而哭泣。(Don't cry over spilled milk.)
author: 英國諺語 (English Proverb)

quote: 真正的慷慨是向不配得到的人付出。(True generosity is an offering; given freely and out of pure love. No strings attached. No expectations.)
author: 伊莎貝爾·阿言德 (Isabel Allende) (類似觀點，原文更強調純粹的愛)

quote: 我們在人生中遇到的每一個人，都在某方面是我們的老師。(Everyone you meet is your teacher in some way.)
author: 不詳 (謙遜學習的態度)

quote: 如果你想得到從未擁有過的東西，就必須做你從未做過的事。(If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.)
author: 托馬斯·傑弗遜 (Thomas Jefferson) (常被歸功於他)

quote: 生活是一面鏡子，你對它笑，它就對你笑；你對它哭，它也對你哭。(Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.)
author: 歐內斯特·霍姆斯 (Ernest Holmes) (類似觀點)

quote: 原諒他人，不是因為他們配得到原諒，而是因為你配得到平靜。(Forgive others, not because they deserve forgiveness, but because you deserve peace.)
author: 喬納森· Lockwood Huie

quote: 不要拿自己的第一章去和別人的第二十章比較。(Don't compare your chapter 1 to someone else's chapter 20.)
author: 不詳 (社群時代的提醒)

quote: 人生最重要的是學會如何施愛，並讓愛進入你的心。(The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.)
author: 莫里·施瓦茨 (Morrie Schwartz)
work: 《最後14堂星期二的課》(Tuesdays with Morrie)

quote: 你不可能取悅每一個人，你不是披薩。(You can't please everyone, you're not pizza.)
author: 不詳 (網路幽默，但有哲理)

quote: 簡單是終極的複雜。(Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.)
author: 李奧納多·達文西 (Leonardo da Vinci)

quote: 我們的心靈就像降落傘，只有張開時才能發揮作用。(Minds are like parachutes - they only function when open.)
author: 湯瑪斯·杜瓦 (Thomas Dewar)

quote: 如果你想測試一個人的品格，就給他權力。(If you want to test a man's character, give him power.)
author: 亞伯拉罕·林肯 (Abraham Lincoln)

quote: 對生活抱持好奇，而非批判。(Be curious, not judgmental.)
author: 華特·惠特曼 (Walt Whitman) (《泰德拉索》影集引用此精神)

quote: 人生識字憂患始。(To be literate is to begin to worry.)
author: 蘇軾 (Su Shi)

quote: 己所不欲，勿施於人。(Do not impose on others what you yourself do not desire.)
author: 孔子 (Confucius)

quote: 內心的平靜，來自於接受現實，而非試圖改變它以符合我們的期望。(Inner peace begins the moment you choose not to allow another person or event to control your emotions.)
author: 一行禪師 (Thich Nhat Hanh) (類似觀點)

quote: 我們都生活在陰溝裡，但仍有人仰望星空。(We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.)
author: 奧斯卡·王爾德 (Oscar Wilde)

quote: 生活中唯一不變的是變化本身，擁抱它，隨之成長。(The only thing constant in life is change. Embrace it and grow with it.)
author: 赫拉克利特 (Heraclitus) (改編)
